alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 11:17AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CHARLOTTE...WESTERN DESOTO... NORTHERN LEE AND SOUTHEASTERN SARASOTA COUNTIES THROUGH NOON EST... At 1117 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Punta Gorda, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, North Port, Punta Gorda, Arcadia, Port Charlotte, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Pine Island Center, Southeast Arcadia, Babcock Ranch, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga, Charlotte County Airport, Pineland, St. James City, Buckingham, and Burnt Store Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota
